scripts.dev:db:init: npm run dev:db:create && npm run dev:db:migrate && npm run dev:db:seed
scripts.test:db:init: npm run test:db:create && npm run test:db:migrate && npm run test:db:seed
scripts.db:init: npm run dev:db:init && npm run test:db:init && echo 'Development and Test databases created, migrated, and seeded!'
scripts.db:create: npm run dev:db:create && npm run test:db:create
scripts.db:migrate: npm run dev:db:migrate && npm run test:db:migrate
scripts.db:seed: npm run dev:db:seed && npm run test:db:seed
scripts.db:reset: npm run sequelize:dev db:drop && npm run sequelize:test db:drop && npm run db:init
scripts.testdb:reset: npm run sequelize:test db:drop && npm run test:db:init
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test dotenv --report-dir=./coverage mocha --recursive --exit ; npm run --silent testdb:reset
